pages.text: $(sol)Not long ago, I found myself in this place, carrying only this empty journal. I am still unsure of how I got here, so I have decided to use it to document my findings in this strange land.$(br2)Having spent a few hours searching around for any signs of civilization, I have concluded this land is entirely uninhabited. I am alone.

$(sol)I managed to fashion some makeshift tools using a nearby tree, and the local wildlife should make for a functional meal, but I am entirely out of my element.$(br2)Night will be upon me soon, and I can hear what I believe is thunder roaring in the distance. I need to find some shelter, and quickly.
